package_data.title: Santorini Romantic Getaway
package_data.description: Experience the magic of Santorini with its iconic blue-domed churches, stunning sunsets, and crystal-clear waters. This 5-day romantic getaway includes luxury accommodation, island tours, and unforgettable dining experiences overlooking the Aegean Sea.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.local: Airport transfers and island hopping boat tours included
amenities: Private boat tour to Red Beach

activities.title: Exclusions
tours: Additional meals and drinks not specified

itinerary.title: Arrival & Check-in
itinerary.description: Arrive at Santorini International Airport. Our team will welcome you with a private transfer to your luxury hotel in Fira. Check-in and enjoy welcome drinks while taking in the breathtaking caldera views. Rest of the day at leisure to explore the nearby area or relax by the infinity pool.

itinerary.title: Fira & Oia Exploration
itinerary.description: After breakfast, explore the charming capital of Fira with its narrow streets, white-washed buildings, and stunning sea views. Visit the Archaeological Museum and browse local shops. In the afternoon, transfer to Oia village, famous for its blue-domed churches and spectacular sunset views. Enjoy a romantic dinner at a cliffside restaurant.

itinerary.title: Beach Day & Wine Tasting
itinerary.description: Morning boat tour to the famous Red Beach and White Beach. Swim in crystal-clear waters and relax on unique volcanic sand. Afternoon visit to a traditional winery for wine tasting, learning about Santorini's unique viticulture. Return to hotel for couples spa treatment.

itinerary.title: Sunset Cruise
itinerary.description: Free morning to explore at your own pace or relax at the hotel. In the afternoon, embark on a luxurious sunset catamaran cruise. Sail past the volcano, hot springs, and secluded beaches. Enjoy a BBQ dinner on board while watching the famous Santorini sunset over the Aegean Sea.

itinerary.title: Photography & Leisure
itinerary.description: Professional photography session at iconic Santorini locations including blue domes, windmills, and caldera views. Capture your memories with stunning backdrops. Afternoon free for last-minute shopping or beach time. Farewell dinner at hotel restaurant.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy your final breakfast with a view. Check-out from hotel and private transfer to Santorini International Airport for your departure flight. Take home unforgettable memories of your romantic getaway.

data.title: Boracay Beach Paradise
data.description: Experience the white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters of Boracay. Includes island hopping, water sports, and beachfront accommodation.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.local: Caticlan airport to Boracay ferry and island transfers

itinerary.title: Arrival Day
itinerary.description: Arrive at Caticlan Airport, ferry to Boracay, hotel check-in, and beach orientation.

itinerary.title: Island Hopping
itinerary.description: Full day island hopping tour visiting Crystal Cove, Crocodile Island, and Puka Beach.

itinerary.title: Beach & Water Sports
itinerary.description: Free day to enjoy White Beach, try water sports, or relax at the resort. Sunset sailing in the evening.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final beach time, check-out, and transfer to Caticlan Airport.

data.title: Baguio Mountain Retreat
data.description: Escape to the cool mountain breeze of Baguio City. Visit strawberry farms, scenic parks, and historic sites in the Summer Capital of the Philippines.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.local: Round-trip bus from Manila to Baguio

itinerary.title: Manila to Baguio
itinerary.description: Early morning departure from Manila. Scenic drive through mountain roads. Arrive in Baguio, hotel check-in, and afternoon city tour.

itinerary.title: Baguio Attractions
itinerary.description: Visit Mines View Park, Botanical Garden, The Mansion, Wright Park, and Burnham Park. Afternoon at Strawberry Farm and Good Shepherd.

itinerary.title: Return to Manila
itinerary.description: Morning at Session Road for shopping, lunch, check-out, and return trip to Manila.
